lead_paragraph: The efforts of Hartmarx, the men’s clothing company, to move out of bankruptcy hit a serious snag on Friday when Wells Fargo, its main creditor, announced its opposition to the company’s choice of a preferred buyer, The New York Times’s Steven Greenhouse reported.

headline.main: Hartmarx Caught Between Its Bidder and Its Bank
